comments.body: Perhaps we should find a better place for set_module?
Probably. At least `overrides.py` does not create any circular imports yet.

comments.body:
I think it would be good to show an example of how negative axes are preserved in the error message
```suggestion
    >>> np.cumsum(array_1d, axis=-2)
```
Maybe as a separate example and not replacing this one.
